title: Despicable Me
short_plot_summary: Gru, a supervillain, plans to steal the moon but finds himself changed by three orphan girls he adopts.
explanation: Gru, the main character who is a supervillain
The moon, which Gru plans to steal
A rocket, representing the technology Gru uses for his plan
A girl, symbolizing the three orphan girls who change Gru's life
A banana, a favorite treat of Gru's yellow Minion helpers
